data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module used to be proprietary code of Clotho Advanced Media
    ("CAM") but is now released under the GPL. We have historically used
    the CAM root namespace to distinguish our modules from others.

    We're not really sure this module *should* appear in the module
    list until it is further refined, but it does serve a useful niche.
    It differs from it's closest "competitor", HTML::Template, in that
    its template syntax is easily overrideable in subclasses.
    Additionally it supports the CAM template syntax, which is of
    obvious importance to us (and likely us alone...).
